summary: A little love for the ADEC body - premium quality style.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/12738-1-1331552420.jpg[/img]

[size=5][code][color=#834e2c].... Description .............[/color][/code][/size]

A premium quality body texture for the ADEC body.
Don´t like too much hair down below? This is for you.

Changes to the original:
- Removal of a fair amount of hair roots to give a more clean shave
- Trimmed the pubic hair into various styles

Fits the ADEC Body v 1.11+ perfectly.


[size=5][code][color=#834e2c].... Install/uninstall .............[/color][/code][/size]

First install Acdale EyeCandy Body ADEC available here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5390]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5390[/url], then choose one of the optional textures from this mod, and install using NMM or download manually.

Automatic install/uninstall:
Use Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)

Manual installation:
Backup your current body texture located at data/textures/actors/character/female/femalebody_1.dds.
Copy the included texture file femalebody_1.dds to data/textures/actors/character/female/ replacing the old one.

Manual uninstall:
Replace the femalebody_1.dds file from this mod, with your original from the backup you did when installing.
Alternative: Reinstall the Original ADEC body replacing the data/textures/actors/character/female/femalebody_1.dds file.


[size=5][code][color=#834e2c].... History .............[/color][/code][/size]

Version 1
First edition, 6 trim variations + one tattoo.

Version 1.1
Added Heart edition.

[size=5][code][color=#834e2c].... Credits and thanks .............[/color][/code][/size]

To Acdale for permission to add this trim pack
To Acdale for the stunning ADEC body: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5390]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5390[/url]
To Navetsea for originally producing the  body textures (pre Acdale)


[size=5][code][color=#834e2c].... Links .............[/color][/code][/size]

Get Acdale´s ADEC body here:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5390]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5390[/url]

Get textures here (this mod):
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12602]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12602[/url]

Get recommended optional female skeleton \"Perfect 3-2\" here (used in the screenshots):
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11064]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11064[/url]


[size=5][code][color=#834e2c].... Future .............[/color][/code][/size]

Probably higher quality texture work, if this mod catches on.
Maybe blonde and ginger editions.
author: SLiDragon
